bossDialog: (A barely identifiable, fleshy chunk drops to the ground before you with a sickening, crunchy splat, and quickly pulls itself together and prepares to attack!)
(The sickening stench of rot and decay fills the room, only increasing as the Shambler, angered by your approach to the treasure hoard, draws near!)
(What you thought was a particularly large growth of mold in the corner begins to move, rising up and dragging itself towards you while emitting disgusting noises!)

cardBonuses.4: Enemies receive 20% more healing while they're afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}.
cardBonuses.7: Enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT} have a 25% chance to resist buffs.

master.dialog: I hope you weren't planning to heal your creatures at any point. My Sea Shamblers will slowly whittle your creatures down without giving them a chance to recuperate!
master.name: Stark

name: Sea Shambler
